There are series of clips with music separated by a clip without music. The repeated clip without music will point you towards a specific person. The first and last clips will confirm you have the correct work.
The work is Fairie's Aire and Death Waltz by John Stump.
Each three second clip corresponds to one of the markings on the work. For example, the man looking at his phone is "gradually becom[ing] agitated".
Draw lines between each indicated marking. Letter breaks are given by the "John Stump" clip.
